commentaries.commentary: Robben sends a fierce cross! It's blocked by the defense!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: Schweinsteiger pounces! He fires it in! GOAL! What a finish!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: What a finish! Crucial goal! Pure joy from Schweinsteiger!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: Rafinha and teammates embrace. Celebrating with the passionate crowd. A huge goal!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: The stadium erupts! What a moment. This goal could be a massive turning point.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: Player 31 with a powerful right-footed strike! It's a GOAL!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: What a goal! Pure power and placement. No chance for the keeper.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: Player 31! Unstoppable shot into the top left corner!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1
